name: strawberry
description: Single file frontend framework for Single File Applications

scripts.size: yarn run fullsize && yarn run minfsize
scripts.fullsize: esbuild . --bundle | tee temp.js | wc -c | awk '{print "full uncomp: " $1}' && gzip -c temp.js | wc -c | awk '{print "full gzippd: " $1}' && rm temp.js
scripts.minfsize: esbuild . --bundle --minify | tee temp.js | wc -c | awk '{print "minf uncomp: " $1}' && gzip -c temp.js | wc -c | awk '{print "minf gzippd: " $1}' && rm temp.js
